metadata.title: Love Dog Charm 925 Sterling Silver French Bulldog Charm Puppy Pet Dog Animal Charms for Dog Lovers
features: The charms hole size is Approximately 4.5mm, and pendant: 20*12mm, weight is 2.2g.
Beads are fully compatible with major brand 3mm European charm bracelets and necklaces.Fits: all major 3mm brand bracelets, such as Pandora, Troll, Chamilia, Kay, Carlo Biagi, Zable bracelets.
Quantity: 1pc, listing only for 1 charm, not including the bracelet.
If you find signs of silver with yellow, don't worry about it, you can wash surface with the polishing silver cloth that we send you as gift.
description: DIY charm Jewelry is a playful collection of bracelet charms that can be personalized to suit your style! Our charms and beads are handmade of authentic 925 sterling silver by highly skilled workers,all are stamped with "925" and fit perfectly on major brand bracelets and bangles.
Our capability:Top quality, Large Stock,,Quick Shipping.
Our Warranty: high quality silver bead,good packing, good service

1. The picture does not show actual size. Please refer to description for size details. 2. Color may vary slightly due to the color calibration of each individual monitor. All prices are single bead price ( does not include two or chain prices ) Not include chain or box. Just add this charm to your collection!
